_comments.pca_components_path: OPTIONAL: Path to pre-computed PCA components. If omitted, will auto-detect <model_dir>/pca_components_nfg<n_fg>.pt
_comments.batch_size: Increased from 2 to 4 for better GPU utilization (adjust based on GPU memory)
_comments.num_train: Number of training samples to use (-1 for all)
_comments.note: PCA components are automatically saved to model_dir when running precompute_pca.py
